Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 7-2032

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This subchapter shall apply to every child development facility and care giver in the District of Columbia.

Unless exempted by this subchapter or the laws of other jurisdictions, the provisions and requirements in this subchapter shall also apply to all child development facilities operated by the District government outside the District of Columbia.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Child Care Services and Facilities. (Refs & Annos)
